title: Hyderabadi Biryani
procedure: Wash and soak the rice for 30 minutes.
Boil the chicken stock and add the rice along with bay leaves.
Cook till the rice is 70% done. Drain the rice and set aside.
In a separate pot, heat mustard oil, add onions and saut√© till golden brown.
Add ginger garlic paste and fry till the raw smell goes away.
Add lamb shanks and cook till brown.
Mix in yogurt and cook till the oil separates.
Layer the cooked rice over the lamb mixture.
Pour saffron milk and ghee over the rice.
Cover the pot with a tight lid and cook on low heat for 30 minutes.
Garnish with coriander and serve with raita.
